remarks: Substituting ` y ` for ` x ` and then ` z ` for ` y ` is equivalent to substituting ` z ` for both ` x ` and ` y ` .  (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 8-Apr-2018.)  Remove dependency on ~ ax-11 .  (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 16-Sep-2018.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 16-Sep-2018.)
statement: sbcom3 $p |- ( [ z / y ] [ y / x ] ph <-> [ z / y ] [ z / x ] ph ) $.
